entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Ogoki
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 02:51 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -33.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Ogoki Post Airport 03:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

Visibility: 16.1 km

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 42.
